title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\AptSettings
name: AptSettings
description:
Apt patching is completed by executing apt-get update && apt-get upgrade. Additional options can be set to control how this is executed.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.AptSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.type
params.description: By changing the type to DIST, the patching is performed using apt-get dist-upgrade instead.

params.name: data.excludes
params.description: List of packages to exclude from update. These packages will be excluded

params.name: data.exclusive_packages
params.description: An exclusive list of packages to be updated. These are the only packages that will be updated. If these packages are not installed, they will be ignored. This field cannot be specified with any other patch configuration fields.

methods.name: getType
methods.description:
By changing the type to DIST, the patching is performed using apt-get dist-upgrade instead.
